entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No error reported for overload ambiguity with extension methods with identical signatures and `params` arrays #72696
  • IDE0040 `for_non_interface_members` option doesn't work #72693
  • Type comparison may not work properly for metadata types #72692

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove primary ctor when moving a type. #72695
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Provide all possible keywords in xml doc comment `langword` tag #72694
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use raw strings in test code #72691
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Correct active statement span tracking #72690
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove feature flag option #72689
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update AI rename UI to make suggestion button more button-like #72676
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version #72688
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Forward diagnostic reanalysis request to be a lsp pull diagnostic refresh instead #72659
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Create stronger type to expression compilation tracker internal policy #72673
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add Emit3 to `-testCompilerOnly` build flag #72685
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Opt into stj serialization on LSPclient #72675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not generate obsolete `Exception` constructor #72671
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • generate package for clasp binary to ensure symbols exist #72686
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix exception for non-cs/vb document #72677
    Area-IDE, untriaged
